personal.name: Víctor Ballester Ribó
personal.title: PhD Student in Aeronautics
personal.description: I am a PhD student in the Department of Aeronautics at Imperial College of London. I graduated in 2023 in Mathematics at Autonomous University of Barcelona and next year I moved to Paris to pursue a master degree at Dauphine-PSL University in Applied and Theoretical Mathematics. My main interests are in the field of Computational Mathematics and PDEs. Specifically, I am particularly interested in the application of Mathematics to Fluid Dynamics.

research_projects.title: 2D Turbulence Spreading

research_projects.title: Numerical propagation of trajectories of Earth-orbiting spacecraft
description: Reconstruction of orbits of satellites from real initial data when considering the Earth a non-uniform spherical distribution of mass and other minor perturbations.
